about_the_game:
The Official, Original, and Outstanding Soundtrack for Crawlco Block Knockers, by OSC! Listen to it at your convenience through the Steam application or whatever music player you like.

Song List:
01 -- Block Knockers (Title Theme)
02 -- Knocked Up (Menu Theme)
03 -- Let's Get Knocking (Tutorial Theme 1)
04 -- Girls on Blocks (Level Theme 2)
05 -- Lipstick Lolliblocks (Level Theme 3)
06 -- Knock, Block, and Roll (Level Theme 4)
07 -- Knocturnal (Level Theme)
08 -- Knocked Off (Stage Clear)
09 -- Knock Blockers (Boss Theme)
10 -- Don't Come Knockin' (End Theme)
11 -- Knocked Out (Game Over)
detailed_description:
More from OSC!

About the Game
